Review.Titre: Key is wrong for my region!!
Review.Contenu: software downloaded, but now when using the key, it says wrong key for your region. Whatt can I do.

Here is my brief email exchange. It speaks for itself. If I could leave 0 stars, I would. Crooks. Wed, Mar 15, 12:20 PM (4 days ago)to supportI purchased a license for MS Office 2016 from you a couple of years ago. Recently, I needed to repair my MS Office installation, and it disappeared from my computer!  I still have the card from you, so I logged onto your site with unique code and received a product key again. I tried to use that to download and reinstall. MS office and MS says the key is not recognized.Unique Code: 498-229Product key I received from you:  NVVCR-69DGR-83JDJ-P8WRF-Q9M3PPlease help me to access/reinstall my rightfully purchased product.Kind Regards,My Name removed for privacysupportThu, Mar 16, 8:17 AM (3 days ago)to meHi , The office pro plus 2016 you puchased is for 1 time activation only. You can't reuse the same product key to reactivate the software or transfer it to another computer. See the products bewlo, you have purchased the first one. There were 2 links here that lead to new product purchases. Links are not allowed in the review here.SoftwarePin
Couldn't activate the software. Contacted you for help and as yet have no response.

Review.Titre: Price too high compared to mashables
The listing on Amazon was not self…
Review.Contenu: The listing on Amazon was not self explanatory. I had to cancel my order and then reorder directly through software pin. So thst was a bit annoying but once I got it right the download and installation were easy.
Very difficult to get working. Support was good, but even their directions left out steps to understand what to do. I wouldn’t buy again from you without a tech support phone line.

I found the SoftwarePin site fairly easy to use. There was lots of help text to guide the first-time user. However, there is some sort of relationship between this site and Microsoft. Because of this the download was more difficult than it should have been -- the download site ran me around in circles for quite awhile before I was able to obtain the software that I ordered.

Review.Titre: Had problem with insulation which could…
Review.Contenu: Had problem with insulation which could have been prevented, if instructions were better. The problem was Microsoft automatically downloads their office applications including their office suite. I was clicking on their icons instead of the icons that came with your download. But your software guy was able to solve the problem really quickly, and everything seem to be working now

Review.Titre: I got the software thru my email and…
Review.Contenu: I got the software thru my email and followed the directions but could not get it to install. You can’t talk to anybody on the phone only thru email at their convenience. Finally on the 3rd day a chat was setup and finally got it installed. It works great but the interaction with the company can definitely use some work.

Review.Titre: Good DownloadIt was an easy purchase and the…
Review.Contenu: It was an easy purchase and the download was smooth with no problems. The installation was a bit confusing because it said I was loading Office 365 when I bought Office 2021, but it actually loaded Office 2021. Activation worked very well and all the office programs were activated.

Review.Titre: so far I am happy with the experience
Review.Contenu: so far I am happy with the experience, but I did load  Office to a computer I don't normally use with Office.  So, I will soon find out how easy it will be to transfer it to the computer that will normally be using it...  That will be the test..

Review.Titre: The turn around response to my email …
Review.Contenu: The turn around response to my email was quick.  I only had 1 day to use my softwarePin.Maybe they could let the customer know that the pin only last for 14 days. This information would be very important and should be included in their instructions.Had i not sent them an email I would have lost my $99. Not a good thing !!
I received the software immediately after purchasing. Software was easy to load. I'm still getting familiar & learning to use the different programs.

They also didn't try and sell me the mist expensive, only just what I needed to do my work.Would highly recommend them to anyone.

I greatly appreciate good support. Thanks Jeff

Review.Titre: easy to find what i need and order it.

Review.Contenu: Everything went well down loading this so 64 bit version after I was able to erase the one I was renting that was 32 bit and there were Spanish and French versions in there that I had a heckuva time erasing I don’t know what the problem was but finally it’s over, and I have downloaded all your stuff and thank you so much. It’s great!

Review.Titre: SoftwarePin is legit. Everything went smoothly.
Review.Contenu: Easy to choose what I wanted, which was Office 2016 to install on Windows 11. Their software choices were clearly labeled as to which versions of Windows the software could be downloaded onto. I purchased the one I wanted, using Amazon Pay, and an email arrived within seconds with my product key. I hit a roadblock because I don't have a Microsoft account but SoftwarePin sent me a workaround. At that point I was able to download, install and activate my purchase smoothly and quickly. Very happy with SoftwarePin. They're legit.

I've ordered software from SoftwarePin on two different occasions. Both time I was very pleased with the service. Shortly after placing the orders, I received an email with detailed instructions for downloading. Worked great both times.

Review.Titre: I was very apprehensive about this…
Review.Contenu: I was very apprehensive about this purchase because it seemed too good to be true.  I did some research and it seemed to be a legitimate seller with good reviews, so I decided to buy it.  The install and activation was easy and I am able to open and use all of the applications included.  Very happy with this purchase.

SoftwarePin has a great price on their products!  And thank you for the discount after my 1st purchase.  Downloading is quick and easy.  I had no problems installing and using the product (Office 365).Thanks SoftwarePin!
Bought a product and it downloaded perfectly. Had a minor issue with product key, but they responded right away and solved the problem, Well done.

Review.Titre: I am what you would call computer…
Review.Contenu: I am what you would call computer challenged.  I had lots of problems installing Microsoft Office but they gave me suggestions and helped me through the computer ordeal.  If I ever need another computer program I will go to SoftwarePin, they are great!!
I waited 3 months before giving a review because sometimes issues arise later. I ordered, I received as promised, I’ve had no problems at all. First class experience.

Review.Titre: I am really happy with this purchase
Review.Contenu: I am really happy with this purchase of Office 2021.  I was using Windows 11 on a new computer and wasn’t sure how to install it properly. I contacted customer service by email, and they got back to me right away and explained how to install it.  It works fine now!
Easy software purchase, the activations are smooth and the prices are great.  The single time I had an activation issue I was provided with a new key immediately.  I highly recommend SoftwarePin.

The transaction was smooth.  Getting assistance because Windows 10 is the second worst OS in the world, was very easy.  The agent who assisted was very knowledgeable.  All in all, SoftwarePin is awesome.

The process was very easy.  More importantly they reached out to me checking to see if there were any issues.  When I identified a problem the responded very quickly with clear information that resolved the issue.
Great experience with this company and their products. Great customer support. Would buy from again for sure.

The download was simple, the instructions were easy to follow, and I had one question that was quickly addressed. It all worked well, and the entire process only took moments. Would definitely look to you for further software needs
My purchase experience was excellent.  I must say I had some trepidation at first when ordering.  But, all worked out very well indeed.  I will use SoftwarePin again and would recommend to others

Review.Titre: PURCHASE AND INSTALL WERE EASY PEASY
Review.Contenu: I asked an initial question about Office 2021 via chat and the rep was very helpful. Once I purchased, everything worked great. I was so surprised at how easy it was to purchase, download and install my new software. I was also surprised that in updating from 2010 to 2021, every folder and email in my Outlook transferred. What a life saver this was. Thank you SoftwarePin!

Review.Titre: Great price...All seems to be working…
Review.Contenu: Great price...All seems to be working fine.   Immediately received the Code via E-Mail along with detailed instructions for downloading and installation.  All Good so far!!  Easy Transaction!

Review.Titre: This was a great buy and experience
Review.Contenu: This was a great buy and experience.  The price was better than other "discounts" that I came across.  The software was easily downloaded and I haven't had any problems.  I would definitely purchase from Software Pin again.

I was having allot of trouble with Outlook.  I had bought and paid for it before, once from Microsoft 2010 and then last year by another company at a very cheap price.  I was having problems with it as usual when Microsoft took over the computer and "fixed" it.  All they did was ruin all my office programs.  I found you and decided to take a chance.  The download was easy and install perfect.  However, I was still having problems with the bloated and impossible Outlook.  I got a message from support from Jeremiah.  He was excellent.  He spent allot of time taking control of the computer and managed, with difficulty thanks to the ridiculous set up by Microsoft, to fix everything.  He was fantastic and I am grateful for the fine service and the help and time he gave me.  Thanks for making it all work!

Review.Titre: The software is exactly what I wanted
Review.Contenu: The software is exactly what I wanted, and it downloaded quickly.  I did come up to one problem which was the Outlook that was being replaced was from 2003.  Yes, 20 yo software, but it worked great with no unnecessary bells and whistles.  But my server was upgrading so I needed to get a new Outlook.  I looked to see which year was the best, and 2021 was my choice.  When I got to the replacement, an original 2003 install CD was required, and I had it.  I just didn't have a CD player on my laptop.  Short story is that we did find our USB CD player, and the install was happy.  I highly recommend the Office 2021.

They honored a complaint and managed it immediately (within 24 hours or less) and apologized for their error. I'm impressed. Their product was well priced and "it was what they said it was" a rare quality.
Easy transaction. Fast service and competitive pricing pricing was a deal maker for me. I never heard of you before. Now that i do, i will always recommend your site to my inner circle. Bravo!

Review.Titre: I'm always skeptical about deals too good to be true
Review.Contenu: I am somewhat skeptical when I see a deal that is just too good to be true.  Before I heard of SoftwarePin I had bought a subscription to Microsoft 365 Home.  I hated it.  I cancelled my subscription and started looking for the 2021 version of Office.  That's when I found SoftwarePin.  I bought the 2021 version of Office for my wife's laptop.  The installation went good and everything worked.  Once I was happy with that I bought 2 more copies and a copy for my MacBook.  Everything works great.  I could not be more happy.

Excellent price. The link to my software was sent immediately. The link directed me to the official Microsoft website and I was able to download the software without any issues. It was a perfect transaction. Thanks!

I had a great experience purchasing the Microsoft  Office from this company. I made the payment and not even 3 minutes later I received an email with instructions to download it. Thank you. I recommend this company.

Review.Titre: The software was exactly what I needed
Review.Contenu: The software was exactly what I needed, easy to install and working great. I am trying to avoid a yearly fee to Microsoft, and SoftwarePin provides a great alternative.

Thank you so much for your responsiveness. I was unable to fix an installation issue on my own, but your staff was very patient, kind, and effective. I really appreciated the help.
